incidents.name: MMS Delivery Delays to Multiple Networks in the US

incident_updates.body: We continue experiencing MMS delivery delays to multiple networks in the US for a subset of short-codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Elevated 500 Errors in Multiple Twilio Products

incident_updates.body: Voice Recordings and Voice Intelligence are operating normally. Engineers are still investigating impact to recordings & transcriptions during the impact window from yesterday's incident (approximately 7:00 AM PT to 9:31 AM PT). We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Voice Recordings and Voice Intelligence are operating normally. Engineers are still investigating impact to recordings & transcriptions during the impact window from yesterday's incident (approximately 7:00 AM PT to 9:31 AM PT). We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

New Voice recordings and Voice Intelligence are now operating normally; engineers are still investigating impact to recordings & transcriptions during the impact window. We will continue investigating and will another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

New Voice recordings and Voice Intelligence are now operating normally; engineers are still investigating impact to recordings & transcriptions during the impact window. We will continue investigating and will another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

New Voice recordings and Voice Intelligence are now operating normally; engineers are still investigating impact to recordings & transcriptions during the impact window. We will continue investigating and will another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

New Voice recordings and Voice Intelligence are now operating normally; engineers are still investigating impact to recordings & transcriptions during the impact window. We will continue investigating and will another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still investigating errors with Voice Recordings and Voice Intelligence. We will continue investigating and will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Proxy, Studio, Flex, Voice, Conversations, Voice Pay and Messaging channels are now operating normally. We are still seeing errors with Voice Recordings. We will continue investigating and will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently investigating an elevated rate of 500 errors in Proxy, Studio, Flex, Voice, Conversations, Messaging channels as WhatsApp, Facebook and Google conversations. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with voice recording. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Italy Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Wind (Tre)

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Italy Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Wind (Tre) Our carrier partner Wind (Tre) Italy is conducting a planned maintenance from 07 October 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 07 September 2023 at 20:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Wind (Tre) Italy customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Verify Silent Network Auth, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 02 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 30 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

02 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 02 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT
04 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 04 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT
09 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 09 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT
